Reviews: This is a version of the game that includes the base game and all DLC so it's definitely a great buy. The DLC is on a voucher that expires August 28, 2022. So there is no reason to buy this if you already own the first vanilla release.About the game:Best Spider-man game to date in terms of story and gameplay. Game takes around 15-20 hours to complete depending on your skill and how fast you intend to rush through the main story campaign. To collect everything and get platinum trophy it can take upwards to 40 hours. Overall, had a blast playing this game. If you're a fan of Spider-man or super hero games in general; it's a must buy.

Review Title: Fantastic game and a recommended buy
Reviews: Delivery was spot on. Ordered it on 20th Jan 11am and was delivered on the same day 5pm. Coming to the product, this is a genuine region 2 copy of spiderman with dlc code which works with Indian Psn account. Would strongly recommend indian PSN users to buy this without worrying about the code issue. The game is spectacular in terms of swinging mechanism and graphics. The combat  part may get boring as you will be facing similar thugs most of the time but try out different suits and suit abilities to keep it interesting. Overall a strong 4.8/5

üî∏Hands down one of the best PS4 games u can play. Everything from the swinging to the combat feels so fluid, you actually feel like you're Spiderman ! (A must have if ur a fan of ‚ÄúSpiderman‚Äù or ‚ÄúBatman Akham series‚Äù)üî∏The delivery from Amazon was lightning fast, received it in one day. The dlc code also worked without any problems.üî∏U get the following missions in the dlc :  ‚Ä¢ The Heist  ‚Ä¢ Turf Wars  ‚Ä¢ Silver Liningüî∏ It takes about 17 hrs to complete the main story, and the dlc adds 3 hrs of extra gameplay. (But feel free to free roam around the city you'll enjoy every minute of it).
I was sent a Africa and middle East licenced only product. To play DLC Indian region licenced disc is required. Waste of time. Replacement ordered. Prospective buyers beware.

Okay, handsdown the best spiderman game. Hell, best marvel game I would say. Even though developers have definitely took inspiration from Batman Arkahm franchise the combat in this feels fresh, the all different suit which you yourself can unlock without giving any money or as an pre-booking bonus feels very good. Also game is filled with Spider-Man Lore/comics reference. Expecting a sequel for this very spiderman-y game which does justice to both comics, has a fresh take on Spidey and villains we loved watching growing up. My rating is 9.2/10 . Minus .7 for being a small game and not including venom suit(for which they have some franchising ideas)

Review Title: Game & Season Pass works on indian PSNas well
Reviews: Ordered the product yesterday and got it today in the morning which was pretty amazing and that's also without Amazon prime. Anyway, for those who are worried that the season pass  works or not, the season pass code works and from the cover looks like it's from the middle east but the code for season pass inside the case "will activate for Indian PSN accounts". I've tried it myself and it works like a charm.Note: No censorship or anything in this game  unlike how it's with Assassins Creed Odyssey since it's from the middle east.

Review Title: DLC code works, Disc works . All in English
Reviews: After buying there was lot of apprehension as  this disc turned out to be R2 disc but it is imported by Sony India and Disc and DLC code all works fine. I was able to redeem code with my India PSN account and once all updates were done able to claim DLC content for free and download. I can only access the DLC content once I have completed one of the mission in main story, till then it is locked to play.But everything works. I am not sure why other people are saying that DLC code doesnt work for them. I chose cloudtail India as the seller may be thats why it worked for me

I was a little skeptical before buying it because of mixed reviews whether the code will work in this edition or not. However, i bought it and got the game today and the code is working absolutely fine. After redeeming the code you will get a message that u got an Avtar. To download DLCs just go to ps store, search them  and click X on ur controller then you will get the download option. Download it and enjoy the game.

Review Title: Superb game but check the region before you opt for the GOTY edition
Reviews: Great game, however the DLC for the Game of the Year Edition is tied to region 2 - which means it works for  Western Europe, the Middle East, South Africa, Egypt, and Japan. So just buy a standard version of the game and buy your DLC from you PS Store and save the grief. I will ultimately have to resort to that as there is no way to swap this DLC code.If you are a fan of the Arkham Batman games this will be equally good.

Wow , Amazing Game, you would not get bored in it for a minute,Web slinging is amazingFighting with enemies and many combosUnlocking suits is easy as you progressExtra side missions like Car chases , puzzles , photography and many more

Even though the disc seems to be imported from Region 2 (R2 on the disc case suggests that which is the PSN code for middle east), the game works fine. Discs are not region locked.DLC is also working. So maybe they're getting the discs from region 2 and swapping out the DLC codes with Indian ones.Anyway, everything seems to work. 4 DLCs are offered which in total add up to about 12-15GB of downloads.

Pros:Most accurate portrayal of Spiderman/Peter ParkerGreat StoryBest Swinging SystemBig collection of suits and  gadgets and abilitiesGood boss fights(except task master)Cons:Side missions are repetitive and get boring fastFight mechanics could be improvedA lot of the gameplay feels very similar to the Arkham GamesOverall: It's the best Spiderman game I've ever played. It's fun and will keep you engaged for a long time especially if you have all the DLC's and decide to go for the Platinum Trophy .Main Playthrough will last 15-16 hours and completing the game in it's entirety could take you upto 30-35 hours ...if you play at a leisurely rate like myself. If you add in the DLC's, that's another 10-12 hours .I bought the Game of the Year Edition for 1500. It comes with all the DLC's (will have to be downloaded separately along with a game update ..it's around 30gb ...keep that in mind before purchasing)  and so to have a game that lasts around 40-50 hours, is based on one of your favourite characters and is totally fun, is well worth the money spent.

An approx 20 GB update is needed to unlock some new suits for free like Sam Raimi suit, future foundation,bombastic bag man and both far from home suits. Had no problem redeeming DLC codes. DLC however also needs to be downloaded additionally. Overall a really great and enjoyable game with an incredible story.

Review Title: THE BEST VERSION OF THE BEST SUPERHERO GAME OF ALL TIME
Reviews: The Game of the Year Edition of this game which is newly released is without a doubt the ideal version to buy right now. It contains the base game + all the DLC content at a reasonable price which is excellent. Buying the standard edition won't give you any extra content or additional storylines, it will just include the base game. So obviously there is no need to buy the old/standard edition of this game!Now, about the game...It's already the highest selling superhero game ever created, and I predict that it's about to become the highest selling PS4 exclusive game of all time (it's sitting just behind Uncharted 4). The gameplay is ridiculously awesome!What are you waiting for???
No doubt this is an awesome game. I've waited so long for the GOTY edition. I am disappointed because DLC is not on disc. There is DLC code voucher.

Review Title: Awesome Action !! Full on Spidy Adventure
Reviews: The package came with a nice outer packaging.. it took less than 10 hours to deliver to my home !! Bought this for my ps5 after playing miles Morales ! At first i thought maybe I'll get a fake disk and I've to return it multiple times but turns out a fully packed genuine game as expected !! The dlc code is easy to redeem.. took less than 1 mins to redeem ! No scratches no dents.. If you're getting it at 40-50% off just get itPros:Epic visualsAwesome actionsNice storylineCon:Repetitive missionsgraphics look kinda meh after playing miles Moralesno adaptive trigger support

WOW! WHAT AN AMAZING GAME.BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS. DELIVERY ON TIME.DLC CODE WORKED.THANKS TO AMAZON AND CLOUDTAIL.WHEN YOU REDEEM THE CODE YOU WILL GET "THE CITY THAT NEVER SLEEPS - SEASON PASS" AND AN AVATAR. AFTER REDEEMING THE CODE, GO TO PS STORE AND SEARCH FOR SPIDERMAN DLC, CLICK ON THE 3 DLCS ONE BY ONE AND YOU WILL SEE DOWNLOAD OPTION.(WHEN YOU SEE THE DLC THERE MIGHT BE PRICE MENTIONED, DON'T WORRY JUST CLICK ON DLC ONE BY ONE AND YOU WILL GET DOWNLOAD OPTION). DLCS TOTAL DOWNLOAD SIZE IS AROUND 8.5GBTO ACCESS THE DLC, FIRST START THE GAME, THEN WHEN YOU ARE IN GAME CLICK ON THE TOUCH-PAD TO ACCESS MAP AND THERE YOU WILL SEE DLC TAB.ONE IMPORTANT THING IS I GOT THE DLC TAB AFTER THE UPDATE. BEFORE UPDATE DLC TAB WAS NOT THERE. (UPDATE SIZE IS AROUND 17GB)HOPE MY REVIEW HELPS:)

My first PS4 game, bought it since I am Spidey fanboy since childhood. Have played all Spidey Games but hands down to this title. It is way 100x more better than all the Spider Man games combined. I bought a PS4 only for playing this title, maybe the best decision I have ever took. This game is such a joy because once you start playing it you can't get your hands off this game. If you are true Spidey fan just go for it. Marvel's Spiderman is one of the best open world game and the best superhero game of all time in my opinion.
